content:
I am posting this on behalf of InterOPEN in the UK.

On our weekly curation call there was a requirement to indicate that an appointment is marked as a NEW or FOLLOW-UP particularly for outpatient appointments.

What is the best practice in this case?

Look forward to your thoughts and guidance.
Will Jones
Looks like something that should go in appointmentType. (The preferred value set looks like it could use a bit of work as some of the concepts are orthogonal but there's no hierarchy defined.)
